entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 08:28 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
